Illumina - Blanket Purchase Order
View My Account
Hello,
Your blanket purchase order ###### has been processed.
You can now place orders against your blanket purchase order balance simply by logging in to your MyIllumina account and entering the blanket purchase order number.
We have created an online account for you so you can immediately begin to use it for making purchases thru our website. A welcome email with instructions for choosing your own password is on the way.
In addition to purchasing products online, your MyIllumina account allows you to also conveniently:
Review and redeem a quote Create scheduled shipments Favorite products to save for easy re-ordering View order history, track order status, and print invoices Share your cart with your colleagues Download latest product catalog with your pricing
If there are any additional purchasers from your organization who will use the blanket purchase order, please let us know. You can contact Customer Service at the phone number below, or you can respond via email to this message.
Thank you for your continued business.
Illumina Customer Support Team North America: 800.809.4566, Ext 2 Outside: 858.202.4566 www.illumina.com
